question: How does the visitor count for Station X on May 09 compare to Station Y?

options.A: Station X on May 09 has more visitors
options.B: Station Y on May 09 has more visitors
options.C: Both have an approximately equal number of visitors

explanation: The y-axis starts at 1000, exaggerating the differences and making Station X on May 09 (1800) appear similiar to Station Y (1100) than it is.
